title: White House says it was consulted by Israel on latest Gaza attacks
shortDescription: The White House said Israel consulted with it before launching widespread airstrikes on Gaza that killed at least 400 on Tuesday.

title: Trump to shut down U.S. Agency for Global Media, Voice of America
shortDescription: Trump’s executive order disbands the U.S. Agency for Global Media, including Voice of America. The order also impacts global broadcasts.

title: Chuck Schumer defends shutdown vote amid calls for him to step aside
shortDescription: Chuck Schumer defended his Senate Democratic leadership role amid calls for his ouster over helping Trump and Republicans avoid a government shutdown.

title: Trump admin withholds details from judge about Venezuelan deportations
shortDescription: Trump invoked the 1798 Alien Enemies Act to hasten deportations of alleged members of Venezuela's crime gang Tren de Aragua, sparking a court fight.

title: Chief Justice John Roberts rebukes Trump over impeachment calls
shortDescription: In a rare public statement, John Roberts said "impeachment is not an appropriate response to disagreement concerning a judicial decision."

title: Trump pledges Kennedy Center overhaul, says it's in disrepair
shortDescription: After JD Vance was booed at a concert, Trump toured the Kennedy Center, saying it is in 'disrepair' and promising to overhaul the cultural center.

title: Musk, Soros help push record spending for Wisconsin court election
shortDescription: With money pouring in from billionaires such as Elon Musk and George Soros, spending in the Wisconsin Supreme Court race could top $100 million.

title: Trump to give countries a tariff number: Some low, some 'quite high'
shortDescription: The Trump administration will give countries a proposed tariff rate based on their own rates, non-tariff trade barriers and other factors.

title: Semisonic blasts White House for using hit song
shortDescription: The White House is under fire for using the rock band Semisonic's 1998 hit song "Closing Time" without permission in a deportation video.

title: Trump revokes 'ridiculous' Secret Service protection for Hunter Biden
shortDescription: Former presidents, their spouses (except when the spouse remarries) receive lifelong Secret Service protection.

title: Who could have their pardon revoked by Donald Trump's autopen claim?
shortDescription: Donald Trump is calling into question that President Joe Biden authorized pardons because of an autopen. Here's who Biden pardoned in January.

title: Trump border czar vows to continue deportations despite court orders
shortDescription: The top Trump administration official said deportation flights will continue -- 'Another flight every day' - even after a judge's ruling halting them.

title: The JFK assassination files will be released today, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said his administration on Tuesday will release all the government's files on the assassination of President John F. Kennedy.

title: Trump threatens 200% wine tariff on EU
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff threats have now hit European wine. The president threatened to slap a 200% levy on all wines and other alcoholic products coming out of Europe.

title: Lawmakers push to classify 'Trump derangement syndrome' as illness in MN
shortDescription: Donald Trump and his supporters have accused critics of having 'Trump derangement syndrome.' Minnesota Republicans want to classify it as a mental illness.

title: Trump to speak with Putin
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will speak to Russian President Vladimir Putin about potential ceasefire negotiations.

title: Trump, administration defend deportation of Venezuelans
shortDescription: The president has invoked a centuries-old wartime law, saying, 'This is a time of war.'

title: Trump says he never liked 'Hamilton' in visit to Kennedy Center
shortDescription: President Donald Trump visited DC's Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and attended a board meeting after naming himself board chair.
